mainText:
rememberingsteve team, thank you very much for this mail address.
-

Hi Steve/Mr. Jobs,

You and my first computer, Macintosh, could change my and our life dramatically.
And you could bring future to us.
It was precious for me to see the future through you.
Please let me say Hello/Thanks to you someday, somewhere.
Good Luck and see you in heaven.
Thank you so much, Steve.

Regards
author: Masafumi
